description: Bring the family together for a delicious pork loin roast topped with crispy sage, and served with juicy honey-roasted peaches and vibrant green beans.
keywords: Pork Roast With Honey Peaches & Sage
name: Pork Roast With Honey Peaches & Sage Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 kg Woolworths Australian boneless pork loin roast

recipeInstructions.text: Cook beans in a saucepan of boiling water for 4 minutes or until just tender, then drain. Top pork with crisp sage, then serve with peaches and beans.
Cook beans in a saucepan of boiling water for 4 minutes or until just tender, then drain. Top pork with crisp sage, then serve with peaches and beans.
